name: STRIKE
description: One Token To Rule Them All Multi-system token powering a sports betting application a full stack media company and a fight league. STRIKE has been developed and designed as an industry first token solution that is utilised in not one, but three different business entities that span and combine the Web 3, sports betting, and combat sports industries. STRIKE grants exclusive seasonal and loyalty based rewards and benefits to our holders who continue to actively support and interact with and across our unique multi-industry ecosystem. The world has never seen anything like STRIKE. Outside of socialfi, our league will also offer a fully interactive platform that focuses on our fights etc. Engage with our platform through a robust leveling system, achievements, and badges. Earn XP for your activities, unlock exclusive rewards, and showcase your accomplishments, all while earning STRIKE tokens. Our gamified approach ensures long-term engagement and community growth.
